reviews.review: Jotenkin niin hieno peli että ei voi kun tykätä. Parhaita aivopähkinöitä koko mailmassa!

Ce jeu est une pelle. Pas une perle, j'ai bien dit une pelle.
Car avec Portal2, vous allez vous creuser la cervelle comme jamais auparavant.

Pour ceux qui ne connaitraient pas encore le principe, c'est simple sur le papier: un lance-portails dans les mains qui peut créer au maximum 2 portails connectés sur les murs, sols, plafonds. A vous de mettre en route la matière grise pour sortir des salles de test et autres chambres de torture encéphalique.

En apparence, c'est simple.
Mais quand l'ordi le plus débile de tous les temps obtient toutes les clés des labos Aperture, ça va se révéler mauvais pour votre espérance de vie.
En plus des portails, vous aurez à disposition différents gels (de propulsion, de répulsion, de conversion...) qui enrichissent encore les niveaux et augmentent les possibilités du jeu. Merci donc aux étudiants de DigiPen pour cette merveilleuse idée.

A noter un mode COOP à 2 (donc 4 portails, vous suivez?) pas spécialement difficile si vous avez un minimum d'expérience dans le jeu, mais sa durée de vie peut être prolongée à l'infini grâce au Workshop et ses petites abeilles bénévoles qui butinent sans cesse pour nous apporter de nouveaux levels, parfois extrêmement complexes.

De longues heures de fun et de réflexion.
You are now thinking with portals.

PS: Attention, les skin de personnalisation des robots sont buggés et n'apparaissent pas en jeu, inutile donc de dépenser votre argent dans le shop sachant que Valve n'a pas l'air pressé de réparer le bug ou de rembourser les joueurs.
Что тут сказать. Valve умеют делать хорошие игры, и эта игра не исключение.
Great puzzle game, really good funny and emotional moments.

Gra inna niż wszystkie. Pobudza szare komórki, przyjemna dla oka i ucha. Dialogi są wyjątkowo zabawne. Grałem w Portal 1 również mi się podobała, natomiast Portal 2 przeszedł moje oczekiwania i jest wyjątkowo dobrą grą. Szczerze polecam!

Portal 2 is filled with taxing but extremely satisfying puzzle challenges that will make the player feel poignant and really consider the way in which he/she is to approach a challenge. Even if you are not very good at these type of problem solving games please do not hesitate to buy this game, i say this because this game has a great tutorial in the intial levels that does a great job at making the player feel confident enough to proceed onwards. i implore any gamer to buy this game as it challenges you in ways that most games cannot. Portal is a game that feels like it has created a genre exclusive to itself, this is partly due to the fact that it has such an original and ingenious concept and also due to the fact that it is the offspring of the incredibly intuitive minds of valve.
Portal 2 = a 10/10 masterpiece and a must buy for any gamer who craves a profoundly engaging experience.

Great game, it's fun and thought provoking. There isn't a better 3 dimensional puzzle game out there. There is great improvements on the original, especialy where the length of the campaign is envolved. The story line is both entertaining and intriguing, it will keep you in a state of giddy excitement as you work your way through levels that never fail to bring something new to the table. The addition of a co-op mode is  very welcome, especialy as it contains its very own story arc however bring a friend as connecting to a server to play with a random person can be a long and frustrating journey and there is always the chance that the person the game shacks you up with wont be feeling co-operative. In all it's is an extremely enjoyable experience that will keep you in a happy trance as you spend the next six to twelve hours of your life in a state of deep concentration as you take part in this crazy adventure. I would definitely recommend this adventure to anyone I know, including those I do not. (ie strangers such as yourself)
Amazing game! Great storyline, challenging puzzles, and there is also co-op and you can also make your own levels too. Quit sitting there reading this review, BUY IT NOW!
Cute and witty, the singleplayer campaign is refreshing and the 2 player coop is plenty of fun because it actually forces you to work together to win, a feature I've rarely seen in co op games

Uno dei migliori giochi a cui abbia mai giocato. Innovativo, brillante, originale, ricco di idee.

Ho amato questo gioco sin dalla prima volta.
Adatto anche a chi non ha giocato il primo Portal (correte a giocarlo cosa aspettate?)

Enigmi stimolanti, carico di humour nero, belle musiche e una longevità 10 volte superiore a quella del primo Portal.

Ottimo in single player, divertentissimo anche in multiplayer.
Il Workshop è ricchissimo di mappe gratuite, e si possono pubblicare le proprie mappe.

P.S. scaricate anche l'espansione gratuita Think with time machine, che introduce un nuovo stile di gioco. e soprattutto l'espansione gratuita Portal Stories: Mel è un motivo in più per prendere questo gioco (e varrebbe da sola la spesa del gioco originale!)

Voto 10/10 uno di quei giochi che ti fanno ringraziare Steam di esistere.

Von vorne bis hinten ein klasse Spiel. Schräge Rätsel, bei denen man im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes "um die Ecke" denken muss. Dazu noch eine klasse Story voller Witz und Charm. Witz ist übrigens ein klasse Stichwort: Es gibt viel zu lachen!
Der Multiplayer-Modus erfordert noch mehr "um die Ecke denken" als es beim Solo-Spiel schon der Fall ist.
Und wem die Rätsel zu lahm sind, der erschafft selbst welche und lässt andere Spieler daran verzweifeln.
Amazing game especially to play with friends

Quando eu comprei o Portal 1 eu fiquei com o pe meio atras, mas depois que eu vi o ótimo jogo que ele era não me contive e zerei logo.

Quando Portal 2 foi anunciado eu fiquei doido e não via a hora de poder jogar.

Portal 2 é realmente um jogo que evoluiu muito com relação ao seu antecessor, ele evoluiu em todos os sentidos, alem dele ser muito maior, com puzzles mais complexos, a historia é muito mais bem trabalhada, vem com modo Co-op que é independente do modo solo mostrando uma perspectiva diferente, ele também tem o mod oficina que pode torna-lo literalmente um jogo infinito.

A inteligencia dele é algo de se surpreender, a cada sala se tem um novo desafio. Todos que jogaram Portal 2 sempre se perguntaram a mesma coisa em determinadas salas "como diabos eu chego la em cima?" 
Portal 2 uma experiencia única nessa geração, ele é um jogo top dos tops.
O sarcasmo neste jogo faz com que tenha momentos de pura comédia. Recomendo.
This game is one of my personal favorites, and the fact that they were able to make this sequel, which in my opinion was pulled off very well compared to others, is just amazing! Keep Workin Valve!
Is a great game would buy it if I were you, just so you could not finish my levels :D
Plays a lot like the first Portal game but with a twist

While I had to look up walkthroughs for every single level, the story is the worth playing the game alone. The characters are memorable and some of the best and funniest in any game. 100/10 would hit that again
